target.text: From the ICEcore Administration portlet on the initial Liferay portal window, click the plus sign (+) to the left of Form and view designers to expand this section and view the available designers. To add the ICEcore Administration portlet to the Liferay portal window, See "Adding the ICEcore Administration Portlet to Your Home Page" on page 14.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand Profile view and click User.

target.name: Step
target.text: To edit the layout of the business card, expand Business card.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add the user's first name below the picture:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK in the dialog that appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the profile elements you want to appear to the right of the user's picture on the business card (use the Shift or Ctrl keys to select multiple elements).

target.name: Step
target.text: Go to a user's workspace and view the changes. In this example, the Organization element has been given a value for the user.
